name: Super Wumpus
overview: Super Wumpus is an advanced version of Wumpus. The player is hunting a fictional Wumpus creature in a cave system. In this variant the rooms of the cave form a dodecahedron structure. The player can move around a cave system of twenty rooms and must try to hunt the Wumpus monster with arrows. The player can fire five arrows into rooms to try to hit the Wumpus and move between the various rooms. The arrows will fly around corners and can possibly hit the player again. The player can also be attacked by bats and fall into pit traps.
